level_3_ability.description: Friend faints: Give one random friend +9   Attack and +6  Health.

level_1_ability.description: Start of battle: Give one random friend without held food +1 attack and +1 health. Multiply with turn number.

level_2_ability.description: Start of battle: Give one random friend without held food +2 attack and +2 health. Multiply with turn number.

level_3_ability.description: Start of battle: Give one random friend without held food +3 attack and +3 [health. Multiply with turn number.

level_1_ability.description: Start of battle: Give Coconut to one random Strawberry friend.

level_2_ability.description: Start of battle: Give Coconut to two random Strawberry friends.

level_3_ability.description: Start of battle: Give Coconut to three random Strawberry friend.

level_1_ability.description: Before attack: Spend 4 Trumpet to gain Coconut perk. Works 1 time per battle.

level_2_ability.description: Before attack: Spend 4 Trumpet to gain Coconut perk. Works 2 time per battle.

level_3_ability.description: Before attack: Spend 4 Trumpet to gain Coconut perk. Works 3 time per battle.

level_1_ability.description: Start of battle: Gain +1 trumpet for each 2 health this has.

level_2_ability.description: Start of battle: Gain +2 trumpets for each 2 health this has.

level_3_ability.description: Start of battle: Gain +3 trumpets for each 2 health this has.

level_1_ability.description: Start of Turn: Spend 1 Gold to activate Buy ability on the nearest friend ahead.

level_2_ability.description: Start of Turn: Spend 1 Gold to activate Buy ability on the nearest friend ahead. Triggers 2 imes.

level_3_ability.description: Start of Turn: Spend 1 Gold to activate Buy ability on the nearest friend ahead. Triggers 3 times.

level_1_ability.description: Friend Faints: If it was a Faint pet, activate its ability again. Works 1 time per turn.

level_2_ability.description: Friend Faints: If it was a Faint pet, activate its ability again. Works 2 time per turn.

level_3_ability.description: Friend Faints: If it was a Faint pet, activate its ability again. Works 3 time per turn.

level_1_ability.description: Faint: Give random friends +1 attack and +1 health for every 3 attack this has.

level_2_ability.description: Faint: Give random friends +2 attack and +2 health for every 3 attack this has.

level_3_ability.description: Faint: Give random friends +3 attack and +3 health for every 3 attack this has.

level_1_ability.description: Friend ahead attacks: Deal 20%  attack damage to one random enemy.

level_2_ability.description: Friend ahead attacks: Deal 40%  attack damage to one random enemy.

level_3_ability.description: Friend ahead attacks: Deal 60%  attack damage to one random enemy.

level_1_ability.description: Five Friendly Attacks: Deal 6 damage to two random enemies.

level_2_ability.description: Five Friendly Attacks: Deal 12 damage to two random enemies.

level_3_ability.description: Five Friendly Attacks: Deal 18 damage to two random enemies.

level_1_ability.description: Friend Summoned: Give 30% of Attack to it.

level_2_ability.description: Friend Summoned: Give 60% of Attack to it.

level_3_ability.description: Friend Summoned: Give 90% of Attack to it.

level_1_ability.description: Spend 7 Gold: Give three random friends +1 Attack and +1 Health.

level_2_ability.description: Spend 7 Gold: Give three random friends +2 Attack and +2 Health.

level_3_ability.description: Spend 7 Gold: Give three random friends +3 Attack and +3 Health.

level_1_ability.description: Sell: Gain +3 Gold.

level_2_ability.description: Sell: Gain +6 Gold.

level_3_ability.description: Sell: Gain +9 Gold.

level_1_ability.description: Test level 1 Ability

level_2_ability.description: Test level 2 Ability

level_3_ability.description: Test level 3 Ability
